messages.message: Hello <!channel> (apologies for this use but its kind of necessary). I am working on fixing all of our sandboxes running on master from being down. The current update is this - due to an env var misconfiguration, services couldnt talk to each other, so despite being up, the platforms were down. We have reverted the changes causing the root issue. Currently, all of these sandboxes are attempting to update, but are timing out at the revive stage. The reason for this is that the revive pipeline waits for the platform to be up by sending a get request to its main URL and waiting until there is a non-error http code. However, since the platform is down, this never happens, so we do not proceed with the update to the deployment. I have done a work around using a custom branch and provisioner script to skip this stage once for aihub-sandbox and also for crafting-aihub. Please let me know if there are any other affected sandboxes

thanks! 24.04 is a priority as we have a PROD blocker for JPMC

https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C041XGH39UN/p1731584842327629?thread_ts=1731523075.901049&cid=C041XGH39UN
We'll look into the 24.04 release sandbox issues
@Arek let me know if there's anything you need to offload, I have some time this morning and can lend a hand
I think everything is handled now - all envs that i found off master have succeeded a deploy and are back up and 24.04 i just truncated the DM tables and am going to see if that fixes it
Sweet deal, sounds good :slightly_smiling_face: Thanks for jumping in, offer still stands if anything comes up (at least until I have to board my flight home lol)
